property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Arsenal may contain up to 3 Mankind and up to 3 Cactus Jack Superstar cards. These cards are blank except where specifically mentioned on the card titled Split Personalities Have Benefits. During your opponent's Draw Segment, he may draw 1 additional card. Once during each of your turns, you may put 1 non-unique card from your Ringside pile into your hand. Your maneuvers are -1D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Strike, Grapple, or Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Your opponent discards his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You must shuffle 3 cards from your hand into your Arsenal. Draw up to 6 cards and end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal. When successfully played and damage has been applied, end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 1 Mankind or Cactus Jack Superstar card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You may put the Mankind or Cactus Jack Superstar card on top of your Dude Love Superstar card and you are now considered that Superstar. If this card is removed from your Ring area, put the Superstar card on top of the Dude Love Superstar card into your Ringside pile and you are now considered Dude Love.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You must put 1 Superstar card on top of the Dude Love Superstar card into your Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring area, all players' maneuvers are -3D.
